name: Basketball Challenge Puzzle
description:
Basketball Challenge Puzzle is an simple but very addictive Physical Shoot game which base on realistic physics. Ready for the great challenge? The goal of this fun physics game is to shoot the basketball. You have many obstacles before the basket. So you need to think about it and utilize the collide and rebound, then adjust the angle and power, try to get the basket ball threw the hoop and get to the next level. Touch to Change power and angle.Release to shoot. You can submit you best scores to challenge highScorer.
Features:
- Different game modes
- Surprise interactive experiences
- Five unique skins: choose your favorite themed environment
- Great game sound effects & music
- Side to side basket movement for challenging play.
